attributes.action: Support the expansion of Lydd airport, together with a coherent surface transport strategy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed expansion of Lydd airport will bring valuable jobs and revenue to the area.  Impact on local residents will be negligible as take offs and landings will take place mostly over sea.

Supported by a proper transport infrastructure Lydd airport has the potential to succeed and benefit locals.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SupportLydd/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
